```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(kableExtra)
```

## Meeting Schedule and Overview

```{r, warning=FALSE}
Week <- c(1:3)
Topic <- c("Intro","Using genomes to understand the tree of life","Week 2 Discussion")
Speaker <- c("Instructors","Bob Literman","Instructors")
Reading <- c("", "", "")

meetings <- cbind(Week, Topic, Speaker, Reading)

kable(meetings, "html") %>%  
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "responsive"))
```
